title: Interpretation of a dream about taking my clothes from my ex-wife’s house in a dream

It may also indicate religion and their need for help, and God knows best. If a divorced woman dreams of taking furniture from her ex-husband’s house, this may be a sign of marriage, and God knows best. title: What do you know about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of making cakes in a dream?

preview.html: Making cakes in a dream for a single woman: Making cakes is one of the easy things that a woman does, whether she is single or married, but when she sees it in her dream, we find her confused, so what does this vision indicate and what are its connotations? This is what we will learn through the opinions of leading scholars in the interpretation of dreams and their opinion on the dream of making cakes in a dream for a single woman.Interpretation of the dream of making cakes in a dreamThe interpretation of seeing cakes in a dream indicates the joy and pleasure that the dreamer will receive soon. Imam Nabulsi said that the vision can have multiple interpretations, but in the end it is poured into the crucible of good news, so let us learn about the different interpretations according to the details. If a woman sees in her dream that she is preparing a cake on one of the happy occasions, such as success, birthday, or other Of things, it's good for her to hear news she's been waiting for. For a while, her children go to school. As for the cake with fruits such as mango, strawberries and other delicious fruits, it is also a vision that will bring a lot of goodness to its owner. Interpretation of seeing cakes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin said: Seeing them in a dream in a different state of insight is good news, provided that they are delicious and not spoiled. The vision can indicate different associations depending on the details of the life that the individual lives, and it may indicate that the dreamer He may have overcome many problems in his life if in reality he suffers from problems and fears. But if the fortune-teller is a married woman, this may indicate that she has overcome her marital differences and used her sound mind to manage the crisis and bring her small family to safety. A man’s vision may indicate... Cake goes to his grandfather and his hard work so that he could achieve his goals of climbing to the top and rising to a prominent position. Especially. Making cakes in a dream for a single woman. Many interpretation scholars said that the more beautiful the cake is in the dream, it shows the extent of goodness that the individual gets. But if she is a young student, then seeing it indicates that she has achieved an advanced position in her studies, which brings happiness. And people to the heart of her family, and makes her parents proud of her to the highest degree. Some also said that in the interpretation of the dream of making cakes for single people, it shows the balanced personality of the girl, as she can deal with her problems on her own without the need for the intervention of others, but she can also provide help and assistance. To any friend who helps her. You need him, so he has a clear and correct opinion on all matters. If a girl wants to confess her love to a young man, but she is too shy to do so, then seeing her cake in a dream is evidence that this young man shares the same feeling with her and is on his way to propose marriage very soon, so he will have to Be patient and he will get what he wants. But if an unmarried woman sees that she is cutting the cake with a sharp tool, then she is an ambitious young woman with many goals that she seeks to achieve. In fact, she does not include marriage on her list of priorities, but rather... She prefers to excel in her studies, w

title: Interpretation of a large snake in a dream is the correct and complete interpretation

preview.html: To meet me, the interpretation of a large snake in a dream, through this article, God Almighty said: “They said dreams are dreams of a pile, and we do not interpret dreams with two worlds” (44). Seeing it in a dream is one of the visions that many people do not want. However, seeing it does not portend bad in all cases, but it differs according to the visions, and today’s encyclopedia provides these interpretations. Interpretation of a large snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a snake in a dream, in general, indicates enemies and hatred. If the patient sees himself living in his sleep; The vision shows his recovery from the disease. Seeing many snakes in a dream is one of the visions that warns the dreamer that there is a conspiracy against him and that one of his relatives will betray him. If he sees a snake swallowing it. This vision indicates an abundance of goods, money, and position. If he sees that he is eating snake meat of any color. This vision expresses a change in the circumstances of his life to the positive, and an approach to prosperity and comfort. But if he sees in a dream the presence of a group of snakes attacking him and trying to kill him, but he overpowers them and kills them. This vision shows that there are many enemies in the dreamer’s life who are trying to trap him, but he will overcome them. Dreaming of the presence of many snakes of different colors - yellow, black, green, white, etc. So these serpents came out of the earth. This vision warns the viewer of the approaching crises and many calamities in the coming period. If he sees that he is killing a snake in his bed. The vision represents the death of his wife. If he sees his pregnant wife in a dream giving birth to a snake. This vision expresses that this boy will be disobedient. Interpretation of a dream about a large gray snake: Seeing a huge, huge snake in the dreamer’s dream - any color indicates the presence of an enemy in the life of the dreamer who is lurking, and this enemy is among those close to him. Seeing a large snake in a dream symbolizes the presence of a person who is jealous of the dreamer. He is jealous of the blessings that God Almighty has given him and this person around him. In case someone sees a big snake and puts it in his house. This vision expresses that his circumstances will change for the better, and that he will achieve all his dreams and reach a high position. If he sees a large dead snake in a dream. The vision expresses the victory of insight over his enemies and expresses his high status. Another interpretation of this vision is the conflict that erupts between him and someone and the victory of insight over him in the end. But if one sees that he is cutting the huge snake into three pieces. This vision shows that he will divorce his wife, and if a married woman sees the same vision, it shows her divorce with three divorces from her husband. A person seeing a huge snake passing by him symbolizes that his enemies are approaching him and conspiring against him and that they were unable to harm him. An unmarried young man dreams of a huge, harmless snake, This means that he will get married soon. But if the unmarried young man sees that the big snake has bitten him. This vision expresses the presence of many enemies around him. Interpretation of a dream about a large snake for one woman. Seeing a large snake in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that there is an enemy hiding inside her and conspiring against her. But if he sees a huge snake at her door, this vision indicates the presence of a woman who is jealous of her and devoted to her. In the event that

title: Interpretation of picking oranges in a dream: planting oranges in a dream

preview.html: A dream about an orange for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man, whether picking oranges from an orange tree, planting orange trees, eating sweet or sour oranges according to Ibn Sirin and more. Oranges are considered one of the fruits that many people love, as they are among the fruits that are beneficial to the health of the body, however Seeing oranges in a dream naturally carries different meanings and symbols, which we will learn about through our report today on seeing oranges in a dream: Interpretation of picking oranges in a dream If someone sees in a dream that he is planting orange trees in a field, farm, or orchard, then this interpretation is good. God willing, awakening will achieve something important in his life. A woman is seen picking or harvesting orange fruits from her trees, and it is interpreted as success for children or the fulfillment of hope. Interpretation of oranges in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing orange trees symbolizes offspring and pregnancy, and holding oranges symbolizes good events and positive changes for the dreamer in a dream. As for seeing green oranges: It symbolizes engagement or marriage to single people. Seeing orange fruit in a dream symbolizes kindness and recovery from diseases. Also, seeing rotten oranges symbolizes sorrows and worries, while oranges with a sweet and intoxicating taste symbolize contentment for the dreamer. Sleeping on an orange in a dream or sitting on it symbolizes To the imminent death of one of his family members. Planting oranges in a dream symbolizes the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desires and acceptance of supplications, God willing. Eating candied oranges in a dream symbolizes goodness and happiness. As for rotten oranges, they are a harbinger of sad events that the fortuneteller will be exposed to, and God knows best. Seeing orange trees symbolizes To recovery from illness and relief of pain, because it symbolizes the marriage of an unmarried young man. Seeing peeled rotten oranges symbolizes failure and the dreamer will be affected by anxiety, grief and sorrow. Trees full of fruit symbolize goodness in the dreamer’s dream, and express good health, the fulfillment of desires and goals, as well as profit. Commercial and professional. Interpretation of a dream about oranges in a dream for a single woman. Seeing oranges in the winter symbolizes engagement soon, while in the summer it symbolizes hostility and family problems. Interpretation of oranges in a dream for a married woman. Buying oranges symbolizes kindness, accepting invitations, and success in life. As for the vision of eating oranges, it symbolizes To the good, happiness, and important events that the woman will have in the near future. When you see the distribution of oranges, it symbolizes good news and surprising events that bring joy to the family. Also, seeing green oranges symbolizes the wife’s male offspring. Orange symbolizes the wife’s pregnancy and the kindness of many to her. Also, seeing an orange tree is a symbol of a pure and honest wife. Buying oranges symbolizes kindness, reconciliation, and family stability for the wife, as well as reconciliation in the field of family and career. Interpretation of oranges in a dream for a pregnant woman. Sour oranges symbolize a boy while having a girl. Also, seeing the color orange and peeling it symbolizes A change

title: Read everything the jurists mentioned to explain the dream of someone I know hugging one person

preview.html: Discover the interpretation of a dream about hugging someone I know for single people. Seeing a hug is one of the visions that symbolizes a colorful feeling of good and innocent feelings, and the vision in its content works to move the viewer’s awareness and express it and put him in the utmost stages of joy and happiness, and this dream has different meanings due to the great difference between the details What each one says, and the vision varies according to the person whom the monarch embraced, whether he was known to him or unknown, and what concerns us is the interpretation of embracing the familiar. The face, especially for single women. Interpretation of a dream about hugging someone I knowThe first indicator of this vision refers to the feeling, inner feelings and strong feeling that connects the dreamer to this person and symbolizes that there is a high probability that the viewer will meet this person in the near future and have a linguistic and serious dialogue. The relationship between them. If there is any rivalry between the dreamer and this person in reality, the vision symbolizes the collapse of the rivalry, the return of the waters to their courses, and the end of the state of hostility that was between them. Seeing an embrace in a dream can indicate the emotional deficiency that the dreamer suffers from in reality. And the absence of support from his life and the secret desire to establish romantic relationships or build new friendships that will last for long periods. If this person is not trusted by the fortuneteller in reality, this is a sign of the importance of caution, taking the necessary precautions, and treating with care and vigilance. And if this person is close to the seer, This vision indicates unified goals between them, joint work, unifying interests, and walking together to achieve the goal. The interpretation of a dream about hugging someone I know symbolizes longing, love, support, and wonderful moments that the dreamer spends with the one he loves. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the chest of someone I know in a dream, Ibn Sirin believes You will see that a hug or embrace in general symbolizes longevity, good health and care that the viewer enjoys. The hug expresses the renewal of blood cells, which means renewing life and moving to a more harmonious and comfortable environment for the viewer, a feeling of pleasure and a psychological state that flourishes day after day. The vision indicates Relationships that are not marred by any disagreement, rapprochement, or separation for a long time, and the vision symbolizes that the dreamer tends to accompany those who are similar to him in qualities, ideas, and aspirations. This person is a relationship of union and agreement. Whoever sees that he is hugging that person tightly, then this vision leads to saying goodbye to that person or welcoming his arrival after an absence. The difference between the two interpretations is the state of the dreamer during the vision. The vision may indicate serious thinking about the relationship with this person, and taking action. The appropriate decision for the current situation and determining the appropriate time to open this matter, and this symbolizes the new adjustments that will occur in the dreamer’s life. The vision also indicates trust, mutual understanding, the desire to stay together for life and hard work to overcome all obstacles that try to prevent them from succeeding. This dream explains Choosing to break up or end the relationship as a last resort, something neither party has ever come close to doing

title: Interpretation of an ex-lover in a dream: I see my old lover in a dream

preview.html: The dream of an ex-lover indicates new relationships and not repeating past mistakes, and other interpretations that we will interpret for single people, for married women, for pregnant women, for divorced women, for men, such as the return of a lover after separation, or I dreamed of my ex-lover talking to me more than once, or seeing an absent lover during my marriage, or someone seeing the ex-lover and talking to him. Or laugh with me or laugh with the old lover. He wants to refer to Ibn Sirin and more to complete the topic: Interpretation of a former lover in a dream Seeing an old lover in a dream If there is a true lover in the visions, then this relationship will end, and if there is no lover in the visions, then this is a sign that love will come in his life and that he will take his first steps towards a new love. . While seeing an eyebrow in a dream has many interpretations, which sometimes indicate separation and sometimes a meeting with a lover. If the owner of this vision is a married man or woman, this indicates the emergence of major problems and disagreements. Seeing an old lover in a dream means that the old lover is still... It leaves an imprint deep within the dreamer, and it reflects the painful moments he experiences and reflects his great desire to forget them, which means that this vision undoubtedly expresses the past. The influence is obtained. In some cases, the appearance of a former lover in the dreams of a married man or fiancé comes from Satan to confuse her in her decisions, especially when she is dissatisfied with her emotional state, so care must be taken in such cases. So as not to give her clarifications that might affect her relationship with her marriage partner. The second issue that the dreamer or dreamer must realize is that the ex-lover in the dream is just a symbol and may not be the person dealing with the matter, and it is very rare for his presence to appear in dreams as evidence. On that. The dreamer's life returns. The symbol of a former lover can have many aspects when it is present in dreams, and we will mention some of them in this article and the meaning that it indicates. Anyone who sees that his former lover has harmed him in a dream, this means a warning to the dreamer not to turn back and move on to your new path. As for those who see it as they wish, returning to the ex-lover in a dream may indicate the desire to create a new relationship, and in some cases the dream indicates the desire to return to the ex-lover. If you see that your ex-boyfriend is giving you advice, this means a warning From your subconscious mind not to repeat the same mistakes that led to the failure of the previous relationship. If your ex-boyfriend kidnaps you in a dream, this indicates that he still has some feelings of love and tenderness towards you. And seeing going to the ex-lover in a dream indicates a feeling of dissatisfaction with the situation in which you live, especially On the emotional side. Whoever sees him waiting for a phone call from an ex-boyfriend in a dream, it indicates the inability to overcome old love and that its effects are still firmly entrenched in your heart or subconscious. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing cantaloupe in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: The secret of seeing watermelon in a dream lies in the abundance of goodness and happiness that comes to the dreamer. Perhaps the vision reflects a lot of money and success in business. Also, an unmarried woman eating watermelon in a dream is good news for marrying a person of good morals and religion. The taste of watermelon in a dream is good and a blessed life and successful deeds. Imam Ibn Sirin also explained seeing a watermelon in a dream, and he explained that he ate it in order to disappear anxiety and distress and get rid of life’s problems and worries, sour in dreams, sadness, and poor management in religion and faith. Seeing rotten watermelon in a dream dreams of the death of a loved one or loss of work. It is related to seeing watermelon in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream about watermelon by Ibn Sirin. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating a yellow cantaloupe, it is evidence of his recovery from some of the diseases to which he is exposed. Sometimes yellow watermelon is a sign of distress and disappointment. Anyone who sees a lot of yellow watermelon is... An indication that the dreamer is a very humble person in a coin. Eating sweet watermelon indicates the disappearance of stress. Whoever sees himself drinking watermelon is evidence that he is doing many good deeds. Whoever thinks that he is eating cantaloupe is lying, this is evidence of poverty. The presence of watermelon in Home to many mistakes. Seeing watermelon in a dream indicates some fears and problems. Watermelon rind shows the characteristics of an unpleasant smell. Interpretation of a dream about watermelon for a single woman. Watermelon in a girl’s dream indicates the approach of her marriage. If you see watermelon with a delicious taste, this is a sign of the abundance of life. It indicates Seeing watermelon indicates goodness and blessings that the girl will receive. Sometimes watermelon in a girl’s dream is just an illusion. Interpretation of a dream about watermelon for a married woman. Being killed when he sees watermelon in a dream for a married woman is a sign of imminent pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about watermelon for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees watermelon in a dream, this is evidence It increases fertility. Watermelon in a pregnant woman’s dream is abundant to earn a living from business or inheritance. Eating watermelon in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates good news and days full of kindness and blessings. If the watermelon in the dream is white, this will be an indication of freedom from illness. If she sees If a pregnant woman eats watermelon, the child will be a boy. If a pregnant woman has any problems, she will soon get rid of them. Seeing a yellow watermelon in a dream is welcome if a friend appears with her. Interpretation of seeing watermelon for a man: A man is lonely, when he sees watermelon in a dream, This indicates that his marriage is approaching. Seeing watermelon in a dream is evidence of a man’s survival on a large scale. Seeing watermelon in a dream Single people may see a lot of watermelon in their dreams and this vision promises a happy and peaceful life with their partner. In some places, this vision indicates major financial problems and crises. A bad psychological state is transmitted through it and affects the dreamer’s vision. White watermelon in a dream is a single man who enjoys abundant health in a dream, and picking watermelon in a dream is an imminent marriage. The interpretation of buying watermelon in a dream. Seeing watermelon in a dream varies from the situation

title: Interpretation of seeing snow in a dream

preview.html: Dreams of snow have different meanings depending on the context of the dream, what the dreamer feels in his dream, how he interacts with snow and the times of snowfall. Follow with us the interpretation of seeing snow in a dream. Interpretation of seeing snow in a dream A dream about snow refers to what you are going through in terms of feeling lonely and lacking in emotions. If you see in your dream that snow is completely covering everything, it means that you want to forget a certain thing. Seeing snow melting in a dream symbolizes a new beginning and new hope in your life. To dream that you are completely buried in snow on purpose means that you are hiding aspects of your personality that you do not You want others to know and you want it to remain secret. If you see dirty snow in your dream, it means that your heart and mind are no longer pure and innocent. Dreaming of dirty snow falling from the sky in a dream indicates that your health will deteriorate. Seeing large snowflakes in a dream means that you will Serious discussions with your loved ones. Seeing pure white snowflakes in a dream symbolizes a stable and harmonious marriage. Interpretation of seeing snow in a dream Seeing snow in a dream symbolizes cold and changing feelings of insight. Seeing pure white snow means that you will enter a season of spiritual purification as the color white It is a symbol of spirituality and purity. If you see a snowflake in your dream, it may mean that you are aware of the fact that you are a completely unique being. Dreaming of playing in the snow means that you often look at life with a happy and innocent attitude. To dream that you are stuck in the snow with your car is a sign that you will get rid of Some inappropriate feelings that you wanted to get rid of and it also symbolizes that you will overcome what is bothering you and surrounding you. If a woman sees snow in her dream, this symbolizes that she has a strong desire to have a child. Seeing falling on a snow cliff in a dream symbolizes a feeling of joy and enjoyment of life Interpretation of seeing a snowstorm in a dream: Seeing snowstorms in a dream symbolizes the insight that he is going through difficult times, despair, and lack of love in his life. If you feel cold in your dream of a snowstorm, this confirms that your heart feels isolated and far away, which makes it difficult. If you dream that it is snowing Snow looks like a severe blizzard, this symbolizes a feeling of confusion and depression. Interpretation of seeing snow falling in the seasons in a dream Seeing snow falling in the summer in a dream means that you will be surprised by a surprise that will make you feel happy. Dreaming of snow falling in the fall means that you will achieve success in work. Seeing snow in the spring in a dream means that you will face minor difficulties in a number of situations. Seeing snow in the fall or summer is a symbol of well-being, good news, and a feeling of comfort. Interpretation of a dream about traveling in the snow: To dream that you are traveling or walking through the snow reminds you of the need to be very careful in this matter. Time of your life, and the need to prepare for every step and watch out for risks. Seeing heavy snowfall while traveling in a dream means that you will be exposed to some external factors that will affect your judgment in making decisions. Interpretation of a dream about eating snow Seeing yourself eating snow in a dream symbolizes that your mind

title: Interpretation of a dream about climbing stairs according to the absolute Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about climbing stairs for a divorced woman: Stairs or stairs are one of the important things inside every home or any other place. Without them, we cannot go up and down from one floor to another. When a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is climbing the stairs, he is surprised by this. He wants to know its interpretation, and scholars believe that this vision carries There are many connotations, and in this article we consider together the most important things that the interpreters said about this dream. Interpretation of a dream of climbing the stairs for a divorced woman: Seeing a divorced woman climbing the stairs in a dream means that she feels tired and hopeless due to many difficulties. In the event that the dreamer ascends the stairs slowly, this indicates That he will enter a new life, but efforts will be made for this. When a separated woman sees herself climbing the stairs, this leads her to persevere and achieve many goals despite many difficulties. And if the dreamer sees in a dream that she is ascending the stairs and coming down from it, then this It will lead to some crises, a setback in her life and many financial crises. Dream Interpretation SecretsThe expert includes a team of the best dream and vision interpreters in the country. The website is in Arabic. To access it, type a page on the Internet Secrets of Dream Interpretation on Google. Interpretation of a dream of climbing stairs by a divorced woman, Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of climbing stairs for a divorced woman easily without feeling miserable indicates many successes in various areas of life. If the dreamer is sick and sees himself climbing the stairs, this indicates a speedy recovery. Which he will enjoy. When a woman sees that she is climbing the stairs with difficulty, this symbolizes the presence of many obstacles and misfortunes that she is suffering from at that time. And if the dreamer sees that she is climbing the stairs in a dream, this means that she wants to get rid of the life she is living, but she is facing difficulties. Because of her ex-husband. A divorced woman who climbs the big stairs in a dream means that she will enjoy good health and enjoy a long life. And the dreamer who climbs the stairs easily without any obstacle and does not feel tired symbolizes that she will overcome any difficult matter in her life with ease. Interpretation of a dream about climbing an elevator for a woman Absolute Interpretation scholars believe that dreaming of climbing an elevator in a dream indicates an easy life without problems or pain. Also, seeing a woman climbing an elevator in a dream means that she will enjoy a life full of luxury, happiness, and peace of mind that she is happy with and good health that God gives her. Soon abroad. Interpretation of a dream about climbing stairs with difficulty for a divorced woman. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman climbing stairs with difficulty indicates many problems that she faces in life and cannot solve, and if the dreamer sees that she is climbing the stairs with difficulty, this means that she will face many problems and obstacles in the following days. When a divorced woman sees her ex-husband climbing the stairs with her and she is unable to do so, this means that she is trying to restore their relationship again and she does not want him and is staying away from him. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dog in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a dog in a dream through our website as the site of the largest dream interpretation site in the Middle East. The dog is one of the domesticated and most loyal animals. It is one of the pets that many people enjoy raising, as the dog is one of the most loyal animals, but when we see a dog in a dream, this vision has another meaning and interpretation for the single, married, pregnant, divorced and widowed, and the owner of the vision wants to know if it is good. A bad mother, and this is what we will list for you in this article. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a dog by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dog in a dream may not be the same. It is possible to be an enemy or a friend, depending on the status of single, married, married, or pregnant. Also, seeing a male dog is different from seeing a female dog, we will explain the details below. A dog barking in a dream indicates an oppressor, tyranny, and tyranny, and whoever sees that a dog is cutting his clothes, this indicates that he is a rude and inferior person and speaks of the honor and respect of insight. Whoever sees in a dream that he is eating Dog meat means he will triumph over his enemies and take their spoils. As a dog indicates guarding, whoever sees that he has been bitten by a dog, this interprets that an enemy will triumph over the owner of the vision. A female dog indicates a shameless woman with a strong tongue, and if she bites the owner of the dream, this indicates that he will be harmed. And whoever sees a puppy in his dream will be the master of his people. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dog in a dream running and attacking the owner of the dream indicates disobedience to him and many sins and bad deeds. Seeing a dog grabbing the owner of the dream and biting him, this explains the presence of evil owners conspiring against him. See also Interpretation of a dream about seeing piles in a dream Interpretation Dream of a single dogDream interpreters disagreed about the unmarried woman who saw the dog in a dream, but they unanimously agreed that they are enemies or haters and envious people around her. An unmarried woman seeing in her dream a white dog, she is someone she trusts, but she will not marry him. As for the woman An unmarried woman who sees a red dog in her dream, this indicates harm and misery. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a brown or gray dog ​​in a dream, and this indicates that you are exposed to injustice. But if an unmarried woman sees a dog in her dream, this means that there is an enemy near her who represents The role of a friend. Seeing a black dog in one dream is interpreted as the presence of an evil man, and a white dog is interpreted as the presence of an honest man. As for seeing one brown dog in a dream, it is hatred and envy, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a dog for a married woman: Seeing a married dog in a dream indicates That there is a man cursing her and cursing her from behind, also indicates betrayal of livelihood and eating money. A dog that sees a married woman in a dream is also interpreted as an evil man who seeks to blackmail her marriage and her home. Seeing a married woman with a dog in a dream also indicates the presence of envious people and those who hate her marriage. Interpretation of a dream about a dog for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant dog in her dream means that there is a person who is jealous of her and envious of her. Seeing a pregnant dog in a dream also indicates the presence of many
